title: ChargeBee |  Software Engineer  | Chennai
content:
**Education:**  
		Btech CSE (RGUKT RK VALLEY ) IIIT 
		2023 Passed out 
**Years of Experience:**  1.1 Year 
**Current Salary**  6L(Base) 
**Prior Experience:** 
		Data Engineer at a Start up in Hyderabad .[1 Year ] 
		Intern at Intel [10 months]
**Date of the Offer**:  9th July 2024
**Company:** ChargeBee
**Title/Level:** Software Engineer
**Location:** Chennai
**Salary:**  16L  INR  
**Relocation:** 0
**Signing Bonus:** 0
**Stock bonus:**  0
**Bonus:**  0
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** 16L
**Benefits:**  
  * Group Mediclaim
Company will bear the full premium of covering you and your dependents under the Group Mediclaim policy for a sum insured of Rs.6,00,000 (Rupees Six Lakhs Only). The dependents include the self, spouse, first 3 dependent children, and dependent parents and parents-in-law, as applicable.
* Group Term Life Insurance
You will be covered under the Group Term Life Insurance Scheme, the sum assured benefit will be 2 times of your Annual CTC.
* Personal Accident Insurance
You will be covered under the Personal Accident Insurance Scheme, for a sum insured of Rs. 30,00,000/- (Rupees Thirty Lakhs Only).
* Gratuity
Gratuity will be payable as per the Gratuity Act, upon leaving the company, subject to completion of a minimum of five years of employment with Chargebee.
  
**Other details:**  I didn't negotiated . I sent the expected CTC was around 18L to 20L . 

**Interview Experience** 
      https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5412311/ChargeBee-or-SDE1-or-Chennai-or-July-03-2024-Offer?currentPage=1&orderBy=most_relevant&query=chargeable

title: CoinDCX | SSE1(SDE-2) | Bangalore | Urgent Advice Needed
content:
Education: CSE from Tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 4+
Prior Experience: Unicorn Startup
Current Salary (Cash):  27LPA (22 base + 3 variable + 2JB)

Date of the Offer: June, 2024
Company: CoinDcx
Title/Level: SSE-1
Location: Onsite BLR
Salary Base: 31 LPA
Signing Bonus: 0
ESOPs: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 31 LPA
Benefits: Standard benefits (Unlimited Welness Leave and other standard perks)

I have 5 switches in past 4 yr due to layoffs(multiple), Thus looking for a stable company with great work life balance to stay in the same org for more than 3years.
Should I join this company or wait for other offers.?
Last layoff in March'24, not working since.

Please suggest if you know about the company as not much info is available.
Work Life Balance, Work Culture, Tech-wise, and job-security given company is into Crypto domain, is it sustainable for longer run, given the stance of Indian government towards Cryptocurrency altogether?
Please advice.

Other Offer: Completed process at Tekion(SDE-2) expecting offer rollout anytime.
